paper.title: An Optimal-time Recursive Evaluator for Attribute Grammars

paper.venue: Proceedings of the 6th Colloquium on International Symposium on Programming
paper.abstract: We present a new evaluation method applicable to any attribute grammars. From each description of attribute grammar we produce an evaluator which is composed by a set of mutually recursive functions, one for each attribute, synthesised or inherited. It detects circularities at run-time and implements an optimal dynamic "evaluation by need".
